data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Job design is how organizations determine which tasks need to be performed by employees. Typically, ____ are ____ based ____ various ____, including ____ skills, ____, tasks ____ must ____ done, ____ the organization's ____. The most common methods of job design involve either a time-based method or a knowledge-based method.
data.partBlankContent: Job design is how organizations determine which tasks need to be performed by employees. Typically, jo__ are desi____ based o_ various fac____, including empl____ skills, exper_____, tasks th__ must b_ done, a__ the organization's go___. The most common methods of job design involve either a time-based method or a knowledge-based method.
data.answer: 工作设计是组织如何确定员工需要完成哪些任务。通常情况下，工作是基于各种因素设计的，包括员工的技能、经验、必须完成的任务和组织的目标。最常见的工作设计方法包括基于时间的方法或基于知识的方法。
